pullRequest.title: [HUDI-714]Add javadoc and comments to hudi write method link
pullRequest.bodyText:
Tips

Thank you very much for contributing to Apache Hudi.
Please review https://hudi.apache.org/contributing.html before opening a pull request.

What is the purpose of the pull request
Add javadoc and comments to hudi write method link
Brief change log
Add javadoc and comments to hudi write method link

Add javadoc
Add some comments in methods
Code clean

Verify this pull request
This pull request is a trivial rework / code cleanup without any test coverage.
Committer checklist


 Has a corresponding JIRA in PR title & commit


 Commit message is descriptive of the change


 CI is green


 Necessary doc changes done or have another open PR


 For large changes, please consider breaking it into sub-tasks under an umbrella JIRA.

nodes.bodyText: may I know why we see just check style changes in few files? was there any change in check style recently ?
we could make this more descriptive. "Drop duplicate records from incoming records. Drop those records that are already present in the dataset"

commit.message: [HUDI-714]Add javadoc and comments to hudi write method link

afterCommit.message: [HUDI-714]Add javadoc and comments to hudi write method link

nodes.bodyText: actually, my bad. we should word it differently. "Drop records already present in the dataset". Drop duplicates might give a wrong notion.

commit.message: update the javadoc of dropDuplicates method
